original_text: And it was not without an oath! Others became priests without any oath,
korean_text: 또 예수께서 제사장이 되신 것은 맹세 없이 된 것이 아니니

sentences.original_text: And it was not without an oath!
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 맹세 없이 이루어지지 않았습니다!

sentences.original_text: Others became priests without any oath,
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들은 맹세 없이 제사장이 되었습니다,
